# 8Labs Components

8Labs components integrated and adapted for the Digital Garden design system.

## Source

All components are from [8Labs](https://www.8labs.io/).

## Components

- SystemBanner - [Source](https://www.8labs.io/components/system-banner)
- Timeline - [Source](https://www.8labs.io/components/timeline)
- StatusIndicator - [Source](https://www.8labs.io/components/status-indicator)
